main event: An unidentified flying object was observed at Wiesbaden Air Base, Germany on October 6, 1957.
interesting points: A radar operator detected a target three times larger than usual that suddenly decreased in size when first sighted., The sighting duration was reported to be 10 to 15 minutes., A bright circular light, described as a 'ball', was observed traveling at high speeds estimated at 800-1,000 mph., The object hovered silently for about 5 minutes before rapidly accelerating and disappearing., Weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: one bright circular light, described as a 'ball', and an oval-shaped object emitting a reddish glow
witness description: Two airmen on patrol at Wiesbaden Air Base
